Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs260.truman_game.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Room class. This class will contains the name for this room, the description for this room, and the items this room contains
    Version:
    11/26/2014
    Author:
    Yong Zheng, Zach Green
